Uses of Class
menuSystem.Menu

  • Packages that use Menu 
    Package Description
    menuSystem
    The menu subsystem is presented upon launching the RoboSport370 application.

    • Uses of Menu in menuSystem

      Subclasses of Menu in menuSystem 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MainMenu
      The code to set up the main menu.
      class  MockMenuOne
      A class used for testing the menuController.
      class  MockMenuTwo
      A class used for testing the menuController
      class  MultiplayerMenu
      The code to construct the multiplayer menu Almost complete: I want to make the entering names smoother for non computer scientists I asked for feedback and it wasn't entirely clear and i agree with this Functionality is all in place.
      class  RobotSelection
      The Code to set up the robot selection menu This menu also handles interaction with the robot librarian This class is incomplete
      class  Rules
      The code to draw and visually test the rules menu.
      class  SinglePlayerMenu
      The code to construct the single player menu
      Fields in menuSystem with type parameters of type Menu 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static java.util.Stack<Menu> MenuController.menuStack
      The stack representing the current path of menus the user has viewed
      Methods in menuSystem with parameters of type Menu 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static void MenuController.addToStack(Menu menuToAdd)
      Puts the desired menu onto the stack and updates the display
